hhiSource: Calculated from NYS DOH licensed bed counts by health system affiliation
cr4Source: Top 4 systems (Northwell, NYU Langone, NYP, Mount Sinai) by share of ~60,000 licensed beds statewide
notes: Statewide HHI is moderate but rising. Regional markets are far more concentrated â€” several upstate regions are effectively single-system markets. The top 4 NYC-based systems control nearly half of all beds statewide, with growing outpatient and physician practice networks not captured in bed counts alone.
